title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-4.17 - Aisles and working spaces
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-4.17 - Aisles and working spaces

State Regulations

Aisles and working spaces between units of equipment, and
between equipment and walls, shall be unobstructed and of sufficient width to
permit employees to perform their duties readily without contamination of food
or food-contact surfaces by clothing or personal contact. All easily movable
storage equipment such as dollies, skids, racks and open-ended pallets shall be
positioned to provide accessibility to working areas. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
